formatted_address: 18 Marina Gardens Dr, #01-18 Children's Garden Cafe, Singapore 018953
name: Finnwood

reviews.text: Paid $16 for a kids meal with egg mayo sandwich. Got a plate full of sugar: froot loops, lollipop, a whole plop of strawberry chocolate, cookie. Low effort obesity-driven meal for children at this price? I think McDonald's is much healthier in comparison.

We tried Finnwood for the first time because it was at the children’s playground at GBTB. Very surprised the food was delicious! We had the four cheese pizza (really good!! If you love blue cheese, you will love this), chicken thigh burger (the fries were freshly fried so its deliciously crispy, and the chicken thigh was so tender and moist), and the spaghetti bolognese (wasn’t salty and super sweet - so we felt it was okay giving to our toddler and she loved it). We really enjoyed ourselves after a morning of water play. The atmosphere is relaxed and chill. We will definitely return here next time we come by the playground!
Paid $4.5 full cup but only got half of machine made coffee. Total rip off. Also no membership discount given.

The food was amazing
The service was fast and there is also a water play area outside where we can play. If we wanna play but don’t want to get wet, we can still play at the dry area where there is a mini playground
Perfect place to make some events such a colourfull cafe. The food is good as well. ✨✨

vicinity: 18 Marina Gardens Drive, #01-18 Children's Garden Cafe
